message.content:
1. There was a reduction on post-operative FVC.
2. There was a reduction on post-operative FEV-1.
3. There was a reduction on post-operative PEFR.
4. The reduction was observed in two groups.
5. The reduction on post-operative FVC was comparable in both groups.
6. The reduction on post-operative FEV-1 was comparable in both groups.
7. The reduction on post-operative PEFR was comparable in both groups.

messages.content:
Statement: A comparable reduction on post-operative FVC and FEV-1 and PEFR was observed in both groups.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
